modName: Everyone Get Inside - Dragon Attack - Beta
summary: Ever wondered why all the inhabitants of Skyrims cities ignore that smart soul who shouts \"Everyone get inside\" when a dragon attacks? Well now they don\'t.
descriptionHtml:
NOTICE: I am currently on hiatus untill I sort some stuff out. This mod will not be updated untill I have managed to do so and I may not respond to messages in a timely manner as I will not be visiting nexus very often.

[size=1]Many thanks to those who have endorsed my work, I appreciate the recognition.[/size]

===Description===

Loosing NPCs to dragon attacks is always annoying, and I\'ve always hated how everyone ignores the shout of \"Everyone get inside\" when a dragon is attacking, so when I checked the nexus sites and didn\'t find a mod for it I decided to make my own.

And here it is, in beta form. When the dragon attacks, non-guard NPCs should run inside their home.

HOW YOU CAN HELP:

You can help by reporting any issues you have with this mod, and giving as much detail as you can when you do.

COMPATIBILITY:

Deadly Dragons compatible
Open Cities compatible

CONFLICTS:

None known so far.

===My Other Mods===

Become a Vampire at the start: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11965
Become a Werewolf at the start: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11674
Sustained Spells: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13450
Vampire Puppet Master: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11854
Werepyres: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11503
Werewolf Second howl Toggle: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12017
author: MGoods
